articles.title: Lakshya Sen vs Chou Tien Chen head-to-head record ahead of quarterfinal clash at Paris Olympics - India TV News
articles.description: Lakshya Sen stormed into the quarterfinals of the men's singles event at the Paris Olympics after defeating compatriot HS Prannoy 21-12 and 21-6. Lakshya's quarterfinal berth has helped him equal India's best performance in men's singles at the Olympics.
articles.content: After an easy win over compatriot HS Prannoy, Lakshya Sen is set to meet Chinese Taipei's Chou Tien Chen in the quarterfinals of the men's singles category at the Paris Olympics on Friday, August 2. … [+2435 chars]

articles.title: Paris Olympics: 'Free visa for everyone if Neeraj Chopra wins gold' - Business Standard
articles.description: Atlys CEO Mohak Nahta, has promised a 'free visa to everyone' if Neeraj Chopra wins gold at the Olympics

articles.title: Indian Olympic Star Involved In Car Accident In Paris. Mother Hospitalised - NDTV Sports

articles.author: Ayushi Srivastava
articles.title: Taapsee Pannu brings a modern twist to the traditional saree at the Paris 2024 Olympics - The Times of India
articles.description: Taapsee Pannu makes heads turn as she ditches a blouse for a waistcoat in a modern saree look.
articles.content: For her glam makeup, Taapsee opted for nude eyeshadow, kohl eyes, smudged eyeliner, darkened brows, blushed cheeks, and a shade of matte pink lipstick.
